server.name: io.github.domdomegg/airtable-mcp-server
server.description: Read and write access to Airtable database schemas, tables, and records.

environmentVariables.description: Airtable personal access token (e.g., pat123.abc123). Create at https://airtable.com/create/tokens/new with scopes: schema.bases:read, data.records:read, and optionally schema.bases:write and data.records:write.
environmentVariables.name: AIRTABLE_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Airtable personal access token (e.g., pat123.abc123). Create at https://airtable.com/create/tokens/new with scopes: schema.bases:read, data.records:read, and optionally schema.bases:write and data.records:write.
environmentVariables.name: AIRTABLE_API_KEY
